statusBarButtons.openApp.tooltip: It opens the app in your default browser.
statusBarButtons.setPortNumber.tooltip: Click to choose the default Port that the Nuxt App will be served at
inputBoxes.setPortNumber.prompt: Choose the Default Port that the Nuxt App will be served at
inputBoxes.setPortNumber.placeHolder: Type in a valid Port Number
inputBoxes.createApp.prompt: Type in a Name for your App
inputBoxes.createApp.placeHolder: Use URL friendly characters for your App, eg: app_name, app-name, appName
